combo: 5-Piece – Left-Arm Sofa + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Right-Arm Sofa
name: Piazza 4-Piece Modular White Linen Sectional Sofa
details: Long, lean, super deep four-piece sectional lounges low to the floor. Clean silhouette has a fresh, casual vibe with European appeal. Luxe white fabric plays well against contrasting white oak. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 5-Piece – Left-Arm Sofa + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Right-Arm Sofa
name: Marguerite 5-Piece L-Shaped White Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Perfectly proportioned in scale, long white sofa has a slim frame that cuts a confident silhouette. Quality is apparent throughout, with a kiln-dried wooden frame certified by the Forest Stewardship Council ® and thick foam-core cushions generously filled with a feather blend for exceptional comfort. The piece is upholstered in an easy-to-clean Crypton® performance fabric that feels like a plush chenille with a hint of linen, giving it a soft texture designed to withstand plenty of wear while retaining its casually elegant feel. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Ottoman + Left Arm Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair
name: Mattea 4-Piece Charcoal Black Performance Linen Sectional Sofa with Left-Arm
details: Low, oversized linen sectional sofa is casually chic while maximizing comfort.. Double-stacked pillowy seat and loose cushions throughout are upholstered in a charcoal black easy-care performance linen blend, creating an unbelievably soft place you'll never want to leave. Combine it with other Mattea pieces to create a sectional to fit your space. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Ottoman + Left Arm Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair
name: Mattea 4-Piece Charcoal Black Performance Linen Sectional Sofa with Left-Arm
details: Low, oversized linen sectional sofa is casually chic while maximizing comfort.. Double-stacked pillowy seat and loose cushions throughout are upholstered in a charcoal black easy-care performance linen blend, creating an unbelievably soft place you'll never want to leave. Combine it with other Mattea pieces to create a sectional to fit your space. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Ottoman + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Armless Loveseat
name: Deseo 4-Piece Modular Charcoal Grey Performance Velvet Sectional Sofa with Loveseat
details: Upholstered in a charcoal performance velvet, large-scale sectional sits low to the ground for modern appeal. The plush silhouette features pillow-like detached cushions with broad armrests that can serve as a relaxed perch for socializing. Sectional pieces can be configured to suit your space. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Left Arm Sofa + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Right Arm Sofa
name: Strato 4-Piece L-Shaped Camel Brown Velvet Sectional Sofa
details: Designed by Mermelada Estudio, this vintage '70s-inspired sectional sofa is upholstered in rich camel velvet with plush channel tufting. Luxe doesn't do it justice. Learn more about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Ottoman + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Armless Loveseat
name: Faible 6-Piece L-Shaped  Wheat Performance Velvet Sectional Sofa with Right-Arm
details: 6-Piece – Ottoman + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Right Arm Chair.

combo: 6-Piece – Ottoman + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Right Arm Chair
name: Faible 6-Piece U-Shaped Brown Leather Sectional Sofa with Right-Arm
details: Grand in scale, vintage-inspired leather sectional sofa by Nicholas Obeid makes the most out of its low-slung silhouette. Set atop a polished stainless steel plinth base, the seat has semi-detached channel-tufted cushions wrapped in tobacco-colored European leather. It's an incredibly comfortable sectional sofa in a naturally worn-in finish. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 6-Piece – Ottoman + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Right Arm Chair
name: Faible 6-Piece U-Shaped Brown Leather Sectional Sofa with Right-Arm
details: Deep, generously proportioned sectional sofa designed by VUUE is sophisticated in Moore & Giles full-grain leather upholstery. The oversized profile is perfect for lounging with family and friends without sacrificing style. Hand-selected for its inherent markings and characteristics, the leather upholstery is finished with layers of wax for a naturally worn-in aesthetic. Customize the sectional layout to suit your individual space. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 6-Piece – Ottoman + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Right Arm Chair
name: Faible 6-Piece U-Shaped Brown Leather Sectional Sofa with Right-Arm
details: Deep, generously proportioned sectional sofa designed by VUUE is sophisticated in Moore & Giles full-grain leather upholstery. The oversized profile is perfect for lounging with family and friends without sacrificing style. Hand-selected for its inherent markings and characteristics, the leather upholstery is finished with layers of wax for a naturally worn-in aesthetic. Customize the sectional layout to suit your individual space. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Ottoman + Armless Apartment Sofa + Corner Chair + Armless Chair
name: Piazza 4-Piece Modular Sectional Sofa with White Oak Legs 105
details: Long, lean, super deep four-piece sectional lounges low on four solid hardwood feet—an elevated update that appreciates high-end craftsmanship and honest materials. Clean silhouette has a plush, pillowed feel thanks to the improved feather-down cushion design. Soft white linen-blend upholstery plays well against the contrasting hardwood feet. Sectional set includes armless chair, corner chair, ottoman and apartment sofa. Can be configured in various ways. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 4-Piece – Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Ottoman
name: Lumis 4-Piece Modular Grey Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Sink into relaxed luxury with this low-slung design by Barcelona-based Mermelada Estudio. Formed of four modular pieces, the sectional's deep, pillow-topped seat and back cushions are finished with a clean piping welt in a soft, linen-like performance fabric. Arrange and rearrange sectional pieces to fit your changing needs. CB2 exclusive.

combo: 6-Piece – Ottoman + Corner Chair + Armless Chair + Armless Chair + Corner Chair + Right Arm Chair
name: Salon Leather 4-Piece Sectional Sofa Bello Grey
details: Scaled just right for smaller spaces, sectional sofa by Nicholas Obeid makes the most out of its footprint. Set atop a polished stainless steel plinth base, the seat has semi-detached channel-tufted cushions wrapped in leather. It's an incredibly comfortable sectional sofa in a very of-the-moment finish. CB2 exclusive.
